Paper.Title: Filtering Errors and Repairing Linguistic Anomalies for Spoken Dialogue Systems

Section.Paragraph: Our work addresses the integration of speech recognition and language processing for whole spoken dialogue systems.

To filter ill-recognized words, we design an on-line computing of word confidence scores based on the recognizer output hypothesis. To infer as much information as possible from the retained sequence of words, we propose a bottom-up syntactico-semantic robust parsing relying on a lexicalized tree grammar and on integrated repairing strategies.
